core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Combine Arcade Cabinet aesthetics with Modern Glassmorphism.
Emotion First: Induce a state of 'Flow' and high-alert tension.
Content is King: The gameplay IS the hero. Everything else frames it.
Contrast: Neon on Deep Navy. Maximum readability for high-speed reflexes.
hall_of_shame: No generic gradients. Use deep, rich, noise-textured gradients.
No 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Unbounded' for character.
No default scroll behavior. This is an app-like experience.

secondary_font.name: Outfit
secondary_font.usage: Body text, Instructions, FAQ, Button Labels

components.name: GameButton
components.description: The primary interactive element (the target). Must feel physical and tactile.
components.implementation_notes: Use CSS 'transform-style: preserve-3d' and 'translateZ' to create depth. On active/click, depress the button. Add a glow effect on hover.

components.name: ModeCard
components.description: Selection card for game modes (Classic, Rule Switch, Chaos).
components.implementation_notes: Large, touch-friendly card. Uses Tilt effect (react-parallax-tilt or similar) if possible, or just scale on hover. Distinct icon/emoji for each mode.

components.name: HeadsUpDisplay
components.description: Floating pill at the top showing Score, Lives, and Current Rule.
components.implementation_notes: Glassmorphism background (backdrop-blur-md). Sticky or fixed at top. Must not obscure gameplay area.

components.name: GameOverScreen
components.implementation_notes: Show score in massive font. 'Play Again' button is the primary CTA. 'Share' button secondary.

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Accordion style FAQ for SEO at the bottom of landing.
components.implementation_notes: Use shadcn Accordion but styled with neon borders and glass background.

layouts.grid_system: Use 'Bento Grid' for Mode Selection. Use 'Absolute Positioning' for Game Area to prevent layout shifts during spawning.
layouts.spacing: Generous padding (p-8, p-12) on Landing. Tight, precise spacing in Game Area.
layouts.mobile: Mobile-first. All touch targets must be at least 48x48px (preferably 64x64px). Prevent overscroll-behavior-y.

principles: Entrance: Staggered fade-in + slide-up for menus.
Feedback: Screen shake (subtle) on wrong click. Particle explosion on correct click.

image_urls.description: Abstract neon purple lines - use as a subtle overlay with 10-20% opacity on the background.
Vibrant purple/black shapes - use for Mode Card backgrounds or Game Over screen banner.

assets.sound_effects: Use Web Audio API or 'use-sound' with basic oscillator beeps/boops if assets unavailable, or free arcade sounds.
assets.icons: lucide-react (Zap, Heart, Skull, Trophy, Share2, Volume2, VolumeX, Play, Pause, RotateCcw)

accessibility.contrast: Ensure neon text has sufficient contrast against dark background (APCA Silver/Gold).
accessibility.reduced_motion: Respect 'prefers-reduced-motion'. Disable shake effects and reduce particle count.

tech_stack_specifics.state_management: React Context or Zustand (simple game state)
tech_stack_specifics.routing: React Router (if needed, or conditional rendering for game states)

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Global Styles: Apply the dark theme and custom fonts in 'index.css'. Remove default white background.
3. Components: Create the 'GameButton' first - it's the core of the experience. Make it juicy.
4. Game Logic: Focus on the 'GameLoop' - timer, spawning logic, score tracking. Keep it in a custom hook.
5. Polish: Add the particles and sound effects LAST. Ensure gameplay feels tight first.
6. SEO: Add the FAQ section at the bottom of the landing screen as requested.
7. Testing: Add data-testid to all buttons (start-game-btn, game-target, etc).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: - Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
- Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
- Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
- Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
- You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
- You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
- Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
